channel.title: The many moods of Playa Phi Playa
channel.description:
Digital love and computer game for mp3 playas.
Avant Garde R&B, Electronic Soul with a Hip-Hop feel appeal to it! On the 7th and 21st of every month there is live streaming video of us taping our show!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Digital love & computer game for mp3 playas!
channel.itunes:author: Playa Phi Playa
channel.itunes:summary:
Digital love and computer game for mp3 playas.
Avant Garde R&B, Electronic Soul with a Hip-Hop feel appeal to it! On the 7th and 21st of every month there is live streaming video of us taping our show!

item.title: Chillaxin B4 A Nightcap...
item.description: Comments: 0 Chilltadis before you step out for a nightcap. That's wassup [sic]. This podcast features a spotlighted jam by The L.I.U. Khalfani and Mack-a-Damion. A must listen. Also some Sleepy Brown and J*Davey. Oh, and the pic? "Maria La Dominicana" (she made sure I said it like that, lol), a good friend of the show, chillaxin before our nightcap with Candy (who is microphone shy). Oh, and you win, I do like Silver Oak wine. How can I not? Always on point when she steps out, too. Indeed. She wants the Playa Phi Playamate of the year award. You be the judge. Maria, I'm feelin' that Playa Phi Playa Purple. Playa Phi Playa is the best at what we do. Subscribe!!! Stay playa, Playa Phi Playa

item.title: Crush on PlayaPhiPlaya.net?
item.description:
<font color="#C0C0C0"> A gift from us to you. Here's a fresh new podcast right out of the box. See, smells new and everything! Louis jams a few old and new tracks. Don't forget to support your favorite podcast by copping these tunes below (it's a compilation of some of our favorite songs from previous podcasts)! Big things are on the horizon, please bear with us as there will be changes in the site over the next few weeks and months... Late. </font>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://widgets.clearspring.com/o/47a77740bcafabe3/482f846b53d4bee4/47a77740111a479b/f1682317/widget.js"></script>
item.dc:creator: Playa Phi Playa
item.itunes:summary: A gift from us to you. Here's a fresh new podcast right out of the box. See, smells new and everything! Louis jams a few old and new tracks. Don't forget to support your favorite podcast by copping these tunes below (it's a compilation of some of our favorite songs from previous podcasts)! Big things are on the horizon, please bear with us as there will be changes in the site over the next few weeks and months... Late.

item.title: New Al Green! Lay It Down Album!!
item.description: You have to subscribe. If you don't subscribe, we don't survive. Chillaxtadis with Playa Phi Playa as we jam a few from the new Al Green album (with some other tunes too). Al's album was worked on by ?uestlove (of The Roots), James Poyser, Anthony Hamilton, and on and on. It's definitely worth picking up on May 27th. Louis chillax's with his friend (actually old school ex-girlfriend) "Lyric". They chit-chat about this and that, and jam to some "Al" in the back. You can't miss this one. Playa Phi Playa y'all! Is Frankie Beverly Feat. Maze next!?!?!
item.dc:creator: Playa Phi Playa

item.title: Plumskinzz with a Winebuzz
item.description:
Playa Phi Playa is a secret society, all we ask is trust! LOL. We play two of Louis' faves off of the new Mint Condition album. Seems that the label dropped the ball on picking a decent lead single. Ah, well, what's new with that? Louis questions his guest about whether she knows what plumskinzz are, and many other interesting etceteras...Louis promises that the next podcast is about an hour long to make up for this 30 minute joint. Further, all web graphic designers and advertisers seeking to work with us send inquiries/examples/kits to Playaphiplayaradio@gmail.com, don't send anything to the podomatic email... Also, everyone trying to send donations to the podomatic address will hit a dead end. Send those to the gmail address now as well, via paypal. Be easier! Happy 4/20 to the Mary Jane lovers across the globe!

Best,

Playa Phi Playa

item.title: Playa Phi Playamate Series: My Thai's for Lunch
item.description:
This is the first installment in what will be the Playa Phi Playamate Series. The lovely and sexy Thai joins Louis for an interesting evening that involves: new music, a kitchen table, alcohol, and little to no inhibition! No one can do it like Playa Phi Playa. There are other podcasts, but they just can't do it like this. We're the #1 MP3 Playas in the podcast game. Special thanks goes out to RapReviews.com for showing love with their audio ad, be sure to check them out. I've been up on them for years. Trust. Is Thai the "Playa Phi Playamate of the Year"?

I know it's been a long time. But it sounds like...

You. Have. Been. Cured.

Nothing further.

item.title: Cheaters Pt. 2
item.description: I know you hate to be kept waiting! Sorry it took so long. Playa Phi Playa is cleaning house to bring you something different this year. Hold tight! Here is the continuation of the Cheaters Podcast. Giselle and Alix continue with their take on things, while we play the role. Playtadis. We'll see you in March. BTW, I think this picture is from Louis' personal archives. Louis, we have alot of questions for you, so get ready to explain this one! Expect some big changes soon, (like a female co-host?) maybe some musical chairs... Who knows... We just have to keep things Playa Phi Playa.

Expect some big changes soon, (like a female co-host?) maybe some musical chairs... Who knows... We just have to keep things Playa Phi Playa.

item.title: Cheaters Pt. 1
item.description:
We told you it was coming! The wait is over. Here is the long awaited podcast. Louis and You(Genious) play bad cop and good cop while interrogating two of Louis' favorite lady friends (Alix and Giselle). The night was a wild one! One day, we might have to do a podcast of our outtakes. It gets that crazy! Oh, to Alix and Giselle, we tried to edit to the best of our ability. Please don't handcuff Louis (again) if it's not to your standards. Er, on second thought, I don't think Louis would mind that at all.
Your friends in good (uh, almost good but more like raunchy) taste,
Playa Phi Playa

item.title: Digital Love, Version 2.0
item.description: Happy New Year everyone! Here's a little sumpin' sumpin' to get your day bumpin'! Digital Love, Version 2.0! Hear my dear: Love ta dis.
item.dc:creator: Playa Phi Playa
item.itunes:summary: Happy New Year everyone! Here's a little sumpin' sumpin' to get your day bumpin'! Digital Love, Version 2.0! Hear my dear: Love ta dis.

item.title: Digital Love, Version 1.0
item.description:
Relatives getting on your nerves? Spending more on gadgets and jewelry than you anticipated, huh? Well, here is some digital love and computer game for all you Mp3 Playas out there. Merry Xmas, Happy Hanukkah, Happy Kwanzaa, or whatever it is that you celebrate (or even if it's just another couple days to you). Here, take this, a shiny new podcast fresh out of the box. Just for you. Don't ever say we never gave you anything! It's been a great year. So, we'll toast to 2008 being even better (this we can assure you). Drink of the month: Crown Royal & Eggnog (or your favorite cognac, whiskey, brandy & eggnog)... See you on the first day of 2008. Stay tuned, we do upgrade this one. Also, right before our annual Valentine's Day show we drop the Cheaters Series! You won't want to sleep on the next month of Playa Phi!!!

P.S. All I want for Xmas is the new Nokia N810... Hint, mutha-effin' hint! LOL, sike! I'm buying that ish for myself! Get creative and think of something else...

Hear My Dear: Chillaxtadis!

item.title: Playa Phi Playa FOREVER! Version 2.0
item.description: There is really nothing for me to say except... If you listen... There is no reason why you shouldn't subscribe... and tell a friend to tell a friend to subscribe! Be on the look out for Digital Love coming at you real soon! Hear My Dear: Play Ta Dis!
item.dc:creator: Playa Phi Playa
item.itunes:summary: There is really nothing for me to say except... If you listen... There is no reason why you shouldn't subscribe... and tell a friend to tell a friend to subscribe! Be on the look out for Digital Love coming at you real soon! Hear My Dear: Play Ta Dis!

item.title: Secrets & Explosions! continued...
item.description:
The day has arrived! "Hear My Dear: Fuc Ta Dis" is FINALLY available for your listening pleasure... Here...Have a free ear-gasm on us! Enclosed is a little something special we decide to give you as a token of our appreciation. Oh... You wanna know what it is, don't you? Well... I'll give you a hint... Just one word... UNRELEASED! All you have to do is click the "Hear My Dear Compilation" link on the right sidebar and... VIOLA! The album is yours... The only drawback.... Once it's gone, it's gone! So get it while it's hot!!! Enjoy.
Note*** Oh, you might need Bitzipper to unzip the .rar file... Get it at http://www.bitzipper.com/download.html !!!

item.title: Playa Phi Playa FOREVER!
item.description: November the 15th is now on the horizon... Don't forget to download that Playa Phi Playa "exclusive" compilation, Hear My Dear: Fuc Ta Dis, Vol.1... Once again; It's only going to be available for 2 weeks! And... It's Free!!!

item.itunes:summary: November the 15th is now on the horizon... Don't forget to download that Playa Phi Playa "exclusive" compilation, Hear My Dear: Fuc Ta Dis, Vol.1... Once again; It's only going to be available for 2 weeks! And... It's Free!!!

item.title: Secrets & Explosions
item.description: We all know what a secret is right? What about "Explosions"? And we're not talking about blowing up a building either... Or are we? I guess you'll just have to listen and find out... We bring to you special guest star Dyno-MITE! Where she describes to you what she hasn't done with a zucchini, but has with a banana... Check out part 1 of this 2 part series. Hear my Dear: Explode ta dis.

item.title: Exclusive!!! Angie Stone: The Art of Love & War
item.description: We interrupt our regularly scheduled podcast schedule... To bring you an EXCLUSIVE FIRST LISTEN of Angie Stone's brand new album... "The Art of Love & War"!!!! We're doing this as a show of our appreciation to all you loyal listeners out there subscribing and passing our podcast on to all your friends... You have told a friend or two, haven't you... Well...Maybe it's time you should. REMEMBER: November 15th... The Playa Phi Playa compilation, "Hear My Dear: Fuctadis vol.1" hits the site for your mp3 pleasure. It will ONLY be available until DECEMBER 1st... Then it goes away! So get it while the gettin' is good! Stay tuned until next week, when Luis and You(genious) bring you "Secrets & Explosions", along with special invited guest... DYNAMITE! This will be a 2 part "explosion" you don't want to miss....

Well...Maybe it's time you should.
REMEMBER: November 15th... The Playa Phi Playa compilation, "Hear My Dear: Fuctadis vol.1" hits the site for your mp3 pleasure. It will ONLY be available until DECEMBER 1st... Then it goes away! So get it while the gettin' is good!
Stay tuned until next week, when Luis and You(genious) bring you "Secrets & Explosions", along with special invited guest... DYNAMITE! This will be a 2 part "explosion" you don't want to miss....

item.title: The 45 min. Seduction
item.description: Well now... Last episode Luis flew solo and hit you with the Jill Scott UNRELEASED podcast... Now it's You(genious)'s time to shine ( with special guest Racy Lacey)... But what I want to do is something a little different. I want to help you create "fire & desire" with your partner... So slide this podcast on whenever you feel the need to turn the heat up in the kitchen! ( if you catch my drift...)! Hear my dear: Seduce Ta Dis... But you only have 45 min.... So if you need more time, just rewind! And Don't forget.... SUBSCRIBE! SUBSCRIBE! SUBSCRIBE! Pass it on!!! P.S. Just a reminder... Nov. 15th... Playa Phi Playa's compilation "Hear My Dear: Fuc Ta Dis vol.1" hits the net for download.... Be on the look out for that really soon!!!

P.S. Just a reminder... Nov. 15th... Playa Phi Playa's compilation "Hear My Dear: Fuc Ta Dis vol.1" hits the net for download.... Be on the look out for that really soon!!!

item.title: Exclusive!!! Jill Scott, The Real Thing: Words and Sounds Vol. 3
item.description:
This album doesn't even come out for another 10 days (Sept. 25th). But Playaphiplaya.net got it's hands on it just for you. We will play all of the best of's from the album (which is basically the whole damn album, but time won't permit it). Louis is also going solo on this podcast, with a special guest this evening, by the name of Lesly. Expect sparks to fly, or things to pop off, or a Crown Royal on ice ending at least? You never know. Listen and find out. You can download the full Jill Scott album at the following link as well. Jill Scott's The Real Thing: Words and Sounds Vol. 3... Much respect to Jill, make sure you buy her album on the 25th as well. Plenty of people will be pissed off if I post this and you don't go and cop it. Playaphiplaya forever. Also, expect the "Here, My Dear" compilation to be posted on Nov. 15 as well. It will be in mpFREE format!!!! Just for you. Yours truly, and most especially. --Louis

Edit (Sept. 25)-- ** Album Link is now unavailable. For future reference, get it while it's hot and fresh. Or, you might not get it at all! Sorry, ONLY SUBSCRIBERS GET IT FIRST. Everyone else just gets the luck of the draw. So HURRY AND SUBSCRIBE! Take your pick how in the menu to the right! Trust we have more exclusives coming, don't be left out again!

item.title: Cruise Control!!!!
item.description: "Ain't no other Kings in this podcast thing, they're siblings. Nothing but our children. With one show, they're disappearing!" We got this thing on automatic pilot. The other podcasts need to fall back and stop saying slick things in your shows before we put you on blast! You're only increasing our fame by saying the name! We are in cruise control, it's nothing to roll past, or over you. This is another podcast with us in top form. You will love. Trust. Enjoy.
item.dc:creator: Playa Phi Playa
item.itunes:summary: "Ain't no other Kings in this podcast thing, they're siblings. Nothing but our children. With one show, they're disappearing!" We got this thing on automatic pilot. The other podcasts need to fall back and stop saying slick things in your shows before we put you on blast! You're only increasing our fame by saying the name! We are in cruise control, it's nothing to roll past, or over you. This is another podcast with us in top form. You will love. Trust. Enjoy.

item.title: Step Out Ta Dis
item.description: Okay... Here's the scene... It's Friday night and you just got paid. You need an excuse to wear that $150 bottle of "Bond #9" you so un-frugally purchase with the rent money... So you do what? Thats right... Go shopping. Thats where this story ends... And YOURS begins... And if your life is anything like ours, it deserves a soundtrack... Well worry no more... Here it is! Just spray and walk away with THIS podcast banging in your ear buds... The soundtrack of a Playa Phi Playa night: Step out ta DIS!!!
item.dc:creator: Playa Phi Playa

Just spray and walk away with THIS podcast banging in your ear buds... The soundtrack of a Playa Phi Playa night: Step out ta DIS!!!

item.title: Definition of Playa Version 2.0
item.description: This is the upgrade. Told you we'd be back sooner than later. It's nothing, thanks to you. Keep telling a friend to tell a friend, and we can start doing this every week. This show was inspired by Bianca Degroat. Google that... Something about her had LiuS dedicating a song to her on the podcast! So, Bianca if (or when) you see this hit us up. We'd (or more specifically, LiuS) would love to hear from you, lol! Also, thanks to everyone for showing love in the comments and emails. There is no Playa Phi Playa without you. Maybe we might get LiuS to show his face in a few pics. Oh and to SmoochezfromFarRockaway, LiuS is indeed a bachelor (a very eligible one). To Allison, You(Genious) hopes you're enjoying "Sex on a Spoon". Anyone else have a special request or shouts? Send it to: playaphiplaya@podomatic.com. Next podcast, we're stepping out. Stay tuned ta dis to find out what that means. In the meantime, if you are out there just listening to this podcast and you haven't subscribed, "Shame on you"... Subscribe through a podcatcher (itunes, etc.)... Let us know you're out there. Then tell a friend, and tell them to tell one too. See you in the next one. WWW.PLAYAPHIPLAYA.NET

item.title: Definition of Playa Version 1.0
item.description: We are back! Sorry for the delay... Louis was moving and w/o internet service in the new place for nearly 2 weeks! All we have to say about that is, "F@#$ Comcast"!!! Blame them, they dropped the ball. Alas, this is a podcast dedicated to those who don't know what it means to be "playa". We drop a couple exclusives for you on this one.. Also, to make up for the waiting you've been doing... We will drop the 2.0 version of this podcast in a week or so... Depends on how much this one gets eaten up.. So pass it around, and tell a friend (and tell a friend to tell a friend), then we can do this every weekend!!!! Want it every week? Let us know, cause we might start doing that. We have some very interesting shows coming up, so stay effing tuned in ta dis!!!

item.title: Sec's in the City: Version2.0 (Still with Peaches&Cream)
item.description: Version 2.0 of the Sec's In The City series. LiuS and YouGenious team up with two beautiful young ladies (Peaches&Cream) to finish a game of Truth or Dare Switch... Try to guess how it ends! More good music, and more good times from Playa Phi Playa!!! Stay tuned... A new podcast series installment is on July 1st. Call us, 206-203-4922... We want to hear from you. Have a few "Seconds in the City" ta dis... It just gets "effing" better everytime! DON'T MISS THIS ONE EITHER! We have some more classic ones coming up y'all!!! Thanks again Peaches & Cream...

item.title: Sec's in the City: Version1.0 (Peaches&Cream)
item.description: LiuS and YouGenious team up with two beautiful young ladies (Peaches&Cream) to play a game of Truth or Dare Switch... The outcome is hilarious and risque! More good music, and more good times from Playa Phi Playa!!! Stay tuned... The next installment is on June 15th. Call us, 206-203-4922... We want to hear from you. Have a few "Seconds in the City" ta dis... It just gets "effing" better everytime! DON'T MISS THIS ONE! We have some classic ones coming up y'all!!! Thanks Peaches & Cream... Peaches where you at!?!?! Cream, I hope you're having a good time vacationing in the islands!!! Playa Phi Playa, baby!!!!

item.title: Hear My Dear: Get Jodecidal Ta Dis Pt. 2
item.description: Before we get started with the particulars: Remember, we are still giving away an Ipod!!! All you have to do is get people to subscribe to this podcast and then they send us an email with your name in it. Yep, that's it. They can subscribe through itunes, odeo, podomatic, where the heck ever they want to!!! Tell them to subscribe and email us your name to: playaphiplaya@podomatic.com!!!! Its that simple!! Listen to "Win an Ipod ta dis" for more details. Now, what you've all been waiting for. The second Jodeci installment! It is well worth the wait. This one is so good we should charge for it.... Don't think that's funny? LOL, tell your friends to subscribe to this then!!! James Jones de la Katy joined us and tells us a crazy story. YouGenious and LiuS [sic] are definitely on point, making this instantly one their best podcasts ever! This show is a return to the foundation, so diehard Playa Phi Playa frat and soro members will appreciate this one. Thanks for being there! See you on the June 1st!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Win an Ipod ta dis!!!
item.description: Who wants to win a F'ing Ipod!?!?! Well good then. PlayaPhiPlaya.net is giving one away every month this summer!!! For May, a 4gb Ipod Nano... Free, no strings attached, you pick the color, and we pay for shipping!!!! All you have to do is get people to subscribe to this podcast and then they send us an email with your name in it. Yep, that's it. They can subscribe through itunes, odeo, podomatic, where the heck ever they want to!!! Tell them to subscribe and email us your name to: playaphiplaya@podomatic.com!!!!! Don't sit back and think you can't win!!!! Trust me, you might be surprised. Now enjoy the podcast. We got a crazy show for you. Three very beautiful ladies came to the playa house to visit us. We played some more good music. And the ladies tell us why "size matters"!!! WHO WANTS TO WIN A FUCKING IPOD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Call us on the Playa house number: 206.203.4922... If a playa doesn't pick up, he's busy, leave a message!

Yep, that's it. They can subscribe through itunes, odeo, podomatic, where the heck ever they want to!!! Tell them to subscribe and email us your name to: playaphiplaya@podomatic.com!!!!! Don't sit back and think you can't win!!!! Trust me, you might be surprised.
Now enjoy the podcast. We got a crazy show for you. Three very beautiful ladies came to the playa house to visit us. We played some more good music. And the ladies tell us why "size matters"!!!
WHO WANTS TO WIN A FUCKING IPOD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Call us on the Playa house number: 206.203.4922... If a playa doesn't pick up, he's busy, leave a message!

item.title: Donate ta dis.
item.description: An open letter from a BMI/ASCAP can screw anyones day up. Royalty rates for internet webcasters are skyrocketing! We're talking hundreds of bucks a month just to bring the music to you. Podcasts like ours are going to soon disappear. Here is a specialty podcast discussing it. We had to put the Jodeci podcast on hold for this serious issue. So listen close, and don't forget to subscribe! Soon this podcast won't be available to anyone who doesn't subscribe. So subscribe and get in on dis, let us know u exist! SUBSCRIBING IS FREE!!!! Help us keep this thing going. Remember: DONATE TA DIS!!!!!! Do what you can, even if it is just passing the podcast on to others. Our potential sponsors are watching! WWW.PLAYAPHIPLAYA.NET My Odeo Channel (odeo/1e5519fa9462d0c2)
item.dc:creator: Playa Phi Playa

item.title: Hear My Dear: Get Jodecidal Ta Dis Pt. 1
item.description: Uh oh.. Okay, we told you it was coming. You're right, the April 1st thing was an April fool's joke. It's finally done. Now you can sit back and get Jodecidal Ta Dis. Do you see the Jodeci pic? WTF? Things have most certainly changed! Not all for the good you might say. Well, we are taking it back for sentimental reasons, and simply because they still hold the title as a group. We play the Jodeci best of's, play our NC-17 voicemails, and tell our sexcapades. In full effect as usual. Remember this is part 1, the early Jodeci period. So listen, chill, vibe, or whatevatadis... Let PlayaPhiPlaya take you all the way there... Comments or requests? Call us: 206-203-4922!!!!!!!!! Stay tuned ta dis...

item.title: Hear my dear: Break-up Ta Dis
item.description: Well now that Balladtimes Day is officially over... You might be in the mood for a change of scenery... or even a change of lover. If you are, or have recently gone through this fiasco.... Then this is the PERFECT podcast for you to bump. You'll see how a Playa Phi Playa... Breaks-up ta dis.

item.title: Happy Balladtimes Day: Romance Ta Dis
item.description: My man Rudy Ray More said... " Romance without finance, is a goddamn nuisance"... But we too Playa for that... Love is grand baby, but divorce is a hundred grand... Make sure you get it right the first time or the next time... With that in mind, we offer you a podcast to take your "special friend" out and about and show your P.D.A. on this very PLAYA Valentines Day! --Love Playa Phi Playa

--Love Playa Phi Playa

item.title: Hear my dear: Caught a case ta dis Pt. 2***
item.description: The long awaited outtake to the previous podcast. Sorry it took so long to bring it to you. PlayaPhiPlaya is back, and in full effect ta dis. Stay tuned...

item.title: Hear my dear: Caught a case ta dis
item.description: Last Podcast we told you we would do a show where we highlight 90's R&B artists that caught a case for some reason or another... Well here it is/ A 2- part podcast. Look for the second half in about a week...

item.title: Hear my dear: Stuck ta dis
item.description: We stuck in this 90's New Jack Swing Era!!! Throw this pod cast on at a party or something... Not only is the music jammin', but its wildley entertaining as well. It's Playa Phi Playa! And 4:30 in the morn!!! Whut?

item.title: Hear my dear: Lay ta dis
item.description: Wanna lay your lover down and make sweet, sweet love? Then dowload this podcast and let Playa Phi Playa take you to the bedroom... How 'bout you lay tour head on OUR pillow?...

item.title: Hear my dear: Fuck ta dis
item.description: Do you love the New Jack Swing out of the 90's like we do??? Weather you're par-laying wit a honey, trying to seduce her out of her panties or just trying to relax with a cigar and feel like listening to some gangsta shit... Your going to enjoy this pod cast.
